trans-unit.source: The amount within which the difference between values can be ignored.

seg-source.mrk: The amount within which the difference between values can be ignored.

target.mrk: 兩個值之間可忽略的差異金額。

trans-unit.source: The amount within which the difference between the calculated values of left and right formulas can be ignored. You can specify the tolerance value or the tolerance percentage, or both, as follows:

seg-source.mrk: The amount within which the difference between the calculated values of left and right formulas can be ignored.
You can specify the tolerance value or the tolerance percentage, or both, as follows:

target.mrk: 左、右側公式計算值之間可忽略的差異金額。
您可如下列指定允差值、允差百分比或同時兩項：

trans-unit.source: Select <uicontrol>And</uicontrol> to require both the calculated difference not to exceed the tolerance value and the difference percentage not to exceed the tolerance percentage to pass the rule.

seg-source.mrk: Select <uicontrol>And</uicontrol> to require both the calculated difference not to exceed the tolerance value and the difference percentage not to exceed the tolerance percentage to pass the rule.

target.mrk: 選擇 <uicontrol>[和]</uicontrol>：若您要通過規則，則需要計算差異不超過允差值，和差異百分比不超過允差百分比。

trans-unit.source: Select <uicontrol>Or</uicontrol> to allow passing the rule when either the calculated difference does not exceed the tolerance value or the difference percentage does not exceed the tolerance percentage.

seg-source.mrk: Select <uicontrol>Or</uicontrol> to allow passing the rule when either the calculated difference does not exceed the tolerance value or the difference percentage does not exceed the tolerance percentage.

target.mrk: 選擇 <uicontrol>[或]</uicontrol>：若計算差異未超過允差值，或差異百分比未超過允差百分比，則此選項可讓您通過規則。

trans-unit.source: In a rule expression that requires left value equal to right value, you accept a difference of 10 US dollars or a difference percentage of 1%. Under <emphasis>Tolerance</emphasis>, you can enter 10 USD as the value and 1% as the percentage, and use <emphasis>Or</emphasis> operator.

seg-source.mrk: In a rule expression that requires left value equal to right value, you accept a difference of 10 US dollars or a difference percentage of 1%.
Under <emphasis>Tolerance</emphasis>, you can enter 10 USD as the value and 1% as the percentage, and use <emphasis>Or</emphasis> operator.

target.mrk: 在需要左、右側值相等的規則運算式中，您需接受 10 美元或 1% 差異百分比的差異。
在<emphasis>允差</emphasis>中，您可輸入 10 美元作為值和 1% 作為百分比，並使用運算子<emphasis>和</emphasis>。

trans-unit.source: If you enter an amount-type operand and specify its currency in the left or right formula, use the same currency for tolerance.

seg-source.mrk: If you enter an amount-type operand and specify its currency in the left or right formula, use the same currency for tolerance.

target.mrk: 若您輸入金額類型的運算元，並在左側或右側公式指定幣別，請於允差使用相同幣別。

trans-unit.source: <uicontrol>Tolerance</uicontrol> is to be compared with <uicontrol>Difference</uicontrol>, which is the absolute difference between <uicontrol>Left Value</uicontrol> and <uicontrol>Right Value</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: <uicontrol>Tolerance</uicontrol> is to be compared with <uicontrol>Difference</uicontrol>, which is the absolute difference between <uicontrol>Left Value</uicontrol> and <uicontrol>Right Value</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>[允差]</uicontrol> 的功能是與 <uicontrol>[差異]</uicontrol> 作比較，此比較結果即為 <uicontrol>[左側值]</uicontrol> 和 <uicontrol>[右側值]</uicontrol> 間的絕對差異。

trans-unit.source: <uicontrol>Tolerance (%)</uicontrol> is to be compared with <uicontrol>Difference (%)</uicontrol>, which equals to the absolute value of <uicontrol>Difference</uicontrol>/<uicontrol>Left Value</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: <uicontrol>Tolerance (%)</uicontrol> is to be compared with <uicontrol>Difference (%)</uicontrol>, which equals to the absolute value of <uicontrol>Difference</uicontrol>/<uicontrol>Left Value</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>[允差 (%)]</uicontrol> 的功能是與 <uicontrol>[差異 (%)]</uicontrol> 作比較，此比較結果即等於 <uicontrol>[差異]</uicontrol>/<uicontrol>[左側值]</uicontrol> 的絕對值。
